text: Tokyo Skytree is absolutely incredible! The views from the top are breathtaking and you can see all of Tokyo. The elevators are fast and the observation decks are well designed. A must-visit!
Very crowded and expensive. Had to wait 2 hours in line and the ticket prices are outrageous. The view is nice but not worth the hassle and cost.
Amazing experience especially at sunset! The tower is beautiful and the views are spectacular. I recommend booking tickets in advance to avoid crowds.
Amazing experience especially at sunset! The tower is beautiful and the views are spectacular. I recommend booking tickets in advance to avoid crowds.
Beautiful traditional temple in the heart of Asakusa. The approach through Nakamise Street is wonderful with lots of traditional snacks and souvenirs. Very spiritual atmosphere.
Too touristy and crowded. Hard to appreciate the temple with so many people taking photos. The surrounding shops are overpriced tourist traps.
Too touristy and crowded. Hard to appreciate the temple with so many people taking photos. The surrounding shops are overpriced tourist traps.
Historic temple with beautiful architecture. The incense ceremony is interesting to watch. Best visited early morning to avoid crowds.
Iconic Tokyo experience! The organized chaos of thousands of people crossing at once is amazing to witness. Great photo opportunities from the surrounding buildings.
Iconic Tokyo experience! The organized chaos of thousands of people crossing at once is amazing to witness. Great photo opportunities from the surrounding buildings.
Just a busy intersection with lots of people. Don't understand the hype. It's crowded, noisy, and there's nothing special about it except the crowds.
Fascinating example of Japanese efficiency and order. Even with thousands of people, everyone moves smoothly. The energy is incredible!
Fascinating example of Japanese efficiency and order. Even with thousands of people, everyone moves smoothly. The energy is incredible!
Early morning visit to see the tuna auctions was unforgettable! The freshest sushi I've ever had. The atmosphere is authentic and bustling. Get there before 5 AM!
Disappointed - most tourist areas have moved to Toyosu. What's left is overcrowded and touristy. The famous sushi shops have huge lines and high prices.
Disappointed - most tourist areas have moved to Toyosu. What's left is overcrowded and touristy. The famous sushi shops have huge lines and high prices.
Beautiful gardens and peaceful atmosphere in the middle of busy Tokyo. The East Gardens are particularly lovely, especially during cherry blossom season.
Most of the palace is closed to public and you can only see it from outside. The gardens are nice but nothing extraordinary. Expected more.
